name: Laurion 404
description: Laurion is an experimental, DN404-based project that starts on Ethereum and continues on Blast. Miners are acquired by buying $LAURION on Uniswap or Laurion NFTs on various marketplaces. Each Laurion miner generates 1 ore per block. Miners are soft-staked by holding in your wallet. You must hold your $LAURION miner to keep your ore. If you sell or transfer, you will lose ores generated by that miner.
